name: Hydrogen Paste
author: Clean Plugins

sections.description:
Hydrogen Paste allows you to paste any elements copied using Hydrogen Pack across all your websites.

You can also paste any Oxygen elements shared by other users of the Oxygen community.

Extra Features in Hydrogen Pack (Pro version)

Hydrogen Pack is the main plugin used to generate the sharable code for any Oxygen element, but it also way more features than just the copy-paste of site components, here is a list of some Hydrogen Pack features

  • Cross Sites Clipboard
  • Custom Right-Click Menu
  • 30+ Customization Keyboard Shortcuts
  • Enhanced Conditions Dialog
  • Enhanced Structure Panel

Here’s a link to Hydrogen Pack features overview.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/erropix-hydrogen-paste directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Open the Oxygen Editor and start pasting elements
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • Compatibility update with Oxygen builder 4.0

1.2

  • Ability to paste conditions
  • Bug fixes and checked compatibility with Hydrogen Pack 1.2

1.1.1

  • Ability to paste full page
  • Ability to paste styles
  • Bug fixes and checked compatibility with Hydrogen Pack 1.1

1.1

  • Fixed minor bugs

1.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: This plugin allows you to paste any elements you have previously copied using Hydrogen Pack
